verses.verse: And of the blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, they made <WH6213> cloths <WH899> of service <WH8278>, to do service <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place, and made <WH6213> the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And he made <WH6213> the ephod <WH646> of gold <WH2091>, blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8438> <WH8144>, and fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>.

And they did beat <WH7554> the gold <WH2091> into <WH854> thin plates <WH6341>, and cut <WH7112> it into wires <WH6616>, to work <WH6213> <WH8432> it in the blue <WH8504>, and in the purple <WH713>, and in the scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and in the fine linen <WH8336>, with cunning <WH2803> work <WH4639>.
They made <WH6213> shoulderpieces <WH3802> for it, to couple it together <WH2266>: by the two <WH8147> edges <WH7098> <WH7099> was it coupled together <WH2266>.

And the curious girdle <WH2805> of his ephod <WH642>, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the work <WH4639> thereof; of gold <WH2091>, blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And they wrought <WH6213> onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68> inclosed <WH4142> in ouches <WH4865> of gold <WH2091>, graven <WH6605>, as signets <WH2368> are graven <WH6603>, with the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And he put <WH7760> them on the shoulders <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646>, that they should be stones <WH68> for a memorial <WH2146> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And he made <WH6213> the breastplate <WH2833> of cunning <WH2803> work <WH4639>, like the work <WH4639> of the ephod <WH646>; of gold <WH2091>, blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>.

It was foursquare <WH7251>; they made <WH6213> the breastplate <WH2833> double <WH3717>: a span <WH2239> was the length <WH753> thereof, and a span <WH2239> the breadth <WH7341> thereof, being doubled <WH3717>.

And they set <WH4390> in it four <WH702> rows <WH2905> of stones <WH68>: the first row <WH2905> was a sardius <WH124>, a topaz <WH6357>, and a carbuncle <WH1304>: this was the first <WH259> row <WH2905>. sardius: or, ruby
And the second <WH8145> row <WH2905>, an emerald <WH5306>, a sapphire <WH5601>, and a diamond <WH3095>.
And the third <WH7992> row <WH2905>, a ligure <WH3958>, an agate <WH7618>, and an amethyst <WH306>.
And the fourth <WH7243> row <WH2905>, a beryl <WH8658>, an onyx <WH7718>, and a jasper <WH3471>: they were inclosed <WH4142> in ouches <WH4865> of gold <WH2091> in their inclosings <WH4396>.

And the stones <WH68> were according to the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>, according to their names <WH8034>, like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet <WH2368>, every one <WH376> with his name <WH8034>, according to the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626>.
And they made <WH6213> upon the breastplate <WH2833> chains <WH8333> at the ends <WH1383>, of wreathen <WH5688> work <WH4639> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.

And they made <WH6213> two <WH8147> ouches <WH4865> of gold <WH2091>, and two <WH8147> gold <WH2091> rings <WH2885>; and put <WH5414> the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> in the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833>.
And they put <WH5414> the two <WH8147> wreathen chains <WH5688> of gold <WH2091> in the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833>.

And the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the two <WH8147> wreathen <WH5688> chains <WH5688> they fastened <WH5414> in the two <WH8147> ouches <WH4865>, and put <WH5414> them on the shoulderpieces <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646>, before <WH6440> it <WH4136>.

And they made <WH6213> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and put <WH7760> them on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833>, upon the border <WH8193> of it, which was on the side <WH5676> of the ephod <WH646> inward <WH1004>.

And they made <WH6213> two <WH8147> other golden <WH2091> rings <WH2885>, and put <WH5414> them on the two <WH8147> sides <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> underneath <WH4295>, toward <WH4136> the forepart <WH6440> of it, over against <WH5980> the other coupling <WH4225> thereof, above <WH4605> the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>.

And they did bind <WH7405> the breastplate <WH2833> by his rings <WH2885> unto the rings <WH2885> of the ephod <WH646> with a lace <WH6616> of blue <WH8504>, that it might be above the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>, and that the breastplate <WH2833> might not be loosed <WH2118> from the ephod <WH646>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And he made <WH6213> the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646> of woven <WH707> work <WH4639>, all <WH3632> of blue <WH8504>.

And there was an hole <WH6310> in the midst <WH8432> of the robe <WH4598>, as the hole <WH6310> of an habergeon <WH8473>, with a band <WH8193> round about <WH5439> the hole <WH6310>, that it should not rend <WH7167>.
And they made <WH6213> upon the hems <WH7757> of the robe <WH4598> pomegranates <WH7416> of blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and twined <WH7806> linen.

And they made <WH6213> bells <WH6472> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and put <WH5414> the bells <WH6472> between <WH8432> the pomegranates <WH7416> upon the hem <WH7757> of the robe <WH4598>, round about <WH5439> between <WH8432> the pomegranates <WH7416>;

A bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate <WH7416>, a bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate <WH7416>, round about <WH5439> the hem <WH7757> of the robe <WH4598> to minister <WH8334> in; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And they made <WH6213> coats <WH3801> of fine linen <WH8336> of woven <WH707> work <WH4639> for Aaron <WH175>, and for his sons <WH1121>,
And a mitre <WH4701> of fine linen <WH8336>, and goodly <WH6287> bonnets <WH4021> of fine linen <WH8336>, and linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> of fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>,

And a girdle <WH73> of fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>, and blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, of needlework <WH7551> <WH4639>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And they made <WH6213> the plate <WH6731> of the holy <WH6944> crown <WH5145> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and wrote <WH3789> upon it a writing <WH4385>, like to the engravings <WH6603> of a signet <WH2368>, HOLINESS <WH6944> TO THE LORD <WH3068>.
And they tied <WH5414> unto it a lace <WH6616> of blue <WH8504>, to fasten <WH5414> it on high <WH4605> upon the mitre <WH4701>; as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

Thus was all the work <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the tent <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> finished <WH3615>: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> according to all that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> they.

And they brought <WH935> the tabernacle <WH4908> unto Moses <WH4872>, the tent <WH168>, and all his furniture <WH3627>, his taches <WH7165>, his boards <WH7175>, his bars <WH1280>, and his pillars <WH5982>, and his sockets <WH134>,
And the covering <WH4372> of rams' <WH352> skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119>, and the covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and the vail <WH6532> of the covering <WH4539>,
The ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, and the staves <WH905> thereof, and the mercy seat <WH3727>,
The table <WH7979>, and all the vessels <WH3627> thereof, and the shewbread <WH6440> <WH3899>,

The pure <WH2889> candlestick <WH4501>, with the lamps <WH5216> thereof, even with the lamps <WH5216> to be set in order <WH4634>, and all the vessels <WH3627> thereof, and the oil <WH8081> for light <WH3974>,

And the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196>, and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>, and the hanging <WH4539> for the tabernacle <WH168> door <WH6607>, the sweet: Heb. the incense of sweet spices
The brasen <WH5178> altar <WH4196>, and his grate <WH4345> of brass <WH5178>, his staves <WH905>, and all his vessels <WH3627>, the laver <WH3595> and his foot <WH3653>,

The hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, his pillars <WH5982>, and his sockets <WH134>, and the hanging <WH4539> for the court <WH2691> gate <WH8179>, his cords <WH4340>, and his pins <WH3489>, and all the vessels <WH3627> of the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, for the tent <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,

The cloths <WH899> of service <WH8278> to do service <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place, and the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, and his sons' <WH1121> garments <WH899>, to minister in the priest's office <WH3547>.
According to all that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> made <WH6213> all the work <WH5656>.

And Moses <WH4872> did look <WH7200> upon all <WH3651> the work <WH4399>, and, behold, they had done <WH6213> it as the LORD <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680>, even so had they done <WH6213> it: and Moses <WH4872> blessed <WH1288> them.
